caption: Really awesome place! Came here for dinner after going to Universal Studios and the food and service hit the spot unlike any other. I have never had a waiter check on me so many times! Wonderful experience!

Had their Soltani, which is a combination of both the Beef Barg and Beef Koobideh.  Meats could have been seasoned slightly more, but I still enjoyed them, especially with their own house made flat bread.  Interestingly, I was not served a …
